itunes:title: reading your luke-warm confessions | w/ darian & britt
title: reading your luke-warm confessions | w/ darian & britt
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
it's a week for pinky gains, as Queen Britt & King Darian sip some luke-warm tea and share your confessions. Tune in to hear about handsome gym men, summer camp mishaps, P-Fit fails, tag-along thongs, befriending cute gym bros, angry middle aged men & more!

Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!

5:00 weekly review

7:30 the cuter older brother

10:07 he had a whole kid

12:34 the handsome gym BF

18:20 have your non-negotiable list

19:14 do not flush pads

21:00 P-Fitt fails

26:50 the tag-along thong

31:12 how to approach cute gym bros

35:17 the middle aged angry man

39:40 family 

41:00 try something new
